page.title: 08EDUCATION 2
page.content: PRIMARY. Children enter the Infant Class at the age of 5. At about the age of 7 children progress to the Junior 1 class and at 9 to Junior 2. Subjects taught are - Mathematics, English, Geography, Science, History, Religious Education, Physical Education, Music, Swimming, Art & Craft, Needlework, Drama, Dancing, Music & Movement, Computer Studies. Every week on four days the school assembles for 15 minutes in the main classroom to sing a hymn and pray. Sometimes a story is read, and if it is someone's birthday the Headteacher gives the child a birthday badge.
